Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the image has been doctored to include a Duterte campaign banner.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it is based on a doctored image.
Exist alternative explanation: The alternative explanation is that the image has been digitally altered to include the campaign banner.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that Sara Duterte is staging a political campaign in war-torn Marawi based on the doctored image.
Understate: There is no evidence of understatement in the claim.
Exaggerate: There is no evidence of exaggeration in the claim.
Falters at times: There is no evidence of the claim faltering at times.
